title: Being and Becoming

content.text: The are two types of people in this world. Those who are and those who delaying their being until it is ready. You are both. You are all there is. There is Self and The World but these are two sides of the same coin. The heads side of this coin is the future.  The past is tails. Why do you think we tell tales about ourself?
